Description:

South Park: The Stick of Truth
role-playing game based on the animated series South Park. 
You play the role of a new student, newly arrived in the city. 
Friends with Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny, you have to defend 
South Park from all misfortunes.

Features:
All the best from the "South Park" - Thanks to the script and voice acting 
by Trey Parker and Matt Stone Ã‚Â«South Park : The Stick of Truth carefully bri
ngs this unique peace to the universe of video games. 

The greatest mission - to become cool ... - Earn a place next to Stan, Kyle, 
Cartman and Kenny, walk with them through the thorny path scandalous 
adventures and save South Park. 

Mighty friend - Meet with classic characters of "South Park" that will help 
you in your business. 

Intense battle - armed to the teeth, choosing a magical enchanted 
weapons and armor.
